attributes.additional_details:
Yet again one of the deadly Murdoch's companies have stolen the rights to free to air broadcasts of Formula One Racing.
These teams bring in £5 billion each to help our world trading.
We now have all major sports bought up by The Murdoch criminals.

There are Millions in this country that cannot afford the £40/month to watch a sport that until today was free both on ITV and BBC when they took over. Why are the BBC allowed to find their own partners that will effectively stop millions from watching F1 racing.
